title: Bug 43285Missing EL Coercion causes argument type mismatch
description: Bug 43285Missing EL Coercion causes argument type mismatch I'll attach a sample web application reproducing the error. Note that this erroronly occurs when using Tomcat 6.0.x (i.e. Moreover it doesn't matter which JSF implementation you're using toreproduce the error (I just wanted to mention that as it's definitely no bug inMyFaces even though the following stack trace shows a FacesException).The exception stack trace:javax.faces.FacesException: Exception while calling broadcast on component :{ComponentPath :
